Quickstrike:





Quickstrike groaned at Black Arachnia's command. He wasn't happy now 
hearing that Hell Beast was back and waiting to take command of the 
Predacon. He walked off, grumbling all the way to the hatch side of 
the ship. He opened it, aiming his arm at Hell Beast and Gremlin. 

"Lemme see yer weapons, tin-horns." he said to them. "An' that don't 
mean shootin' me!" He took a step back. "What ya want?"
